00028 #ifndef MIXEDFILECHECK_H
00029 #define MIXEDFILECHECK_H
00030 
00031 #include "util/Convert.h"
00032 #include "util/RegressionCheck.h"
00033 //
00034 #include <cstring>
00035 #include <fstream>
00036 #include <sstream>
00037 #include <string>
00038 //
00039 
00045 class MixedFileCheck: public RegressionCheck
00046 {
00047 public:
00057   MixedFileCheck (const std::string &generatedFile, const std::string &goldFile, const double eps,
00058     const unsigned int skipLines, const unsigned int allowedMismatch)
00059     : m_GeneratedFile (generatedFile), m_GoldFile (goldFile), m_Eps (eps),
00060       m_SkipLines (skipLines), m_AllowedMismatch (allowedMismatch)
00061   { 
00062         m_Name = Util::fileRoot(generatedFile);
00063   }
00064 
00071   bool check (std::string& errorMsg)
00072   {
00073     // Convert File Names
00074     m_GoldFile = Util::convertPathName(m_GoldFile);
00075     m_GeneratedFile = Util::convertPathName(m_GeneratedFile);
00076 
00077     // Open files.
00078     Verbose::out(1,"Reading in file: " + m_GoldFile);
00079     Verbose::out(1,"Reading in file: " + m_GeneratedFile);
00080 
00081     std::ifstream generatedStream (m_GeneratedFile.c_str());
00082     if (! generatedStream )
00083     {
00084       errorMsg = "Unable to open generated file " + m_GeneratedFile;
00085       Verbose::out(1,errorMsg);
00086       return false;
00087     }
00088     std::ifstream goldStream (m_GoldFile.c_str());
00089     if (! goldStream )
00090     {
00091       errorMsg = "Unable to open gold file " + m_GoldFile;
00092       Verbose::out(1,errorMsg);
00093       return false;
00094     }
00095     unsigned int lineCount = 0;
00096     unsigned int mismatchCount = 0;
00097     const char* lineEndings = "\r\n";
00098     std::string goldLine, generatedLine;
00099     Verbose::out(1,"Looking for differences.");
00100     while (! goldStream.eof() && ! goldStream.fail())
00101     {
00102       // Skip header lines -- for now
00103       // really need TsvFileCheck that replaces
00104       // MixedFileCheck and MatrixFileCheck
00105       do {
00106           getline (goldStream, goldLine);
00107       } while(goldLine[0] == '#');
00108       do {
00109         getline (generatedStream, generatedLine);
00110       } while(generatedLine[0] == '#');
00111       if (generatedStream.eof() && ! goldStream.eof())
00112       {
00113         errorMsg = "The generated file, " + m_GeneratedFile
00114         + ", has fewer lines than the gold file, " + m_GoldFile;
00115         Verbose::out(1,errorMsg);
00116         return false;
00117       }
00118       // Skip header lines which need not be equal.
00119       if (++lineCount > m_SkipLines)
00120       {
00121         // Avoid line ending hassles.
00122         goldLine = goldLine.erase (goldLine.find_last_not_of (lineEndings) + 1);
00123         generatedLine = generatedLine.erase (generatedLine.find_last_not_of (lineEndings) + 1);
00124 
00125         // Skipping white space, convert each line to a series of strings.
00126         std::istringstream goldStream (goldLine);
00127         std::istringstream generatedStream (generatedLine);
00128         std::string goldString, generatedString;
00129         while (goldStream >> goldString)
00130         {
00131           // Require the same number of whitespace delimited fields.
00132           if (! (generatedStream >> generatedString))
00133           {
00134         Verbose::out(1,"Unequal amount of whitespace delimited fileds in files");
00135             errorMsg = lineErrorMsg (generatedLine, goldLine);
00136         Verbose::out(1,errorMsg);
00137             return false;
00138           }
00139           double goldDouble, generatedDouble;
00140           bool goldSuccess, generatedSuccess;
00141           goldDouble = Convert::toDoubleCheck (goldString.c_str(), &goldSuccess);
00142           generatedDouble = Convert::toDoubleCheck (generatedString.c_str(), &generatedSuccess);
00143 
00144           // If both fields are numeric, check for equality within the prescribed tolerance.
00145           if (goldSuccess && generatedSuccess)
00146           {
00147             if (fabs (goldDouble - generatedDouble) > m_Eps) {
00148           //Verbose::out(1,"Numbers differ: " + ToStr(goldDouble) + " and " + ToStr(generatedDouble));
00149               ++mismatchCount;
00150         }
00151             continue;
00152           }
00153 
00154           // If neither field is numeric, require them to be identical.
00155           if ((! goldSuccess) && (! generatedSuccess) && (goldString == generatedString))
00156             continue;
00157       else
00158         Verbose::out(1,"Strings differ: " + goldString + " and " + generatedString);
00159 
00160           // Quit if there is a type mismatch or both fields are non-numeric, not identical.
00161           errorMsg = lineErrorMsg (generatedLine, goldLine);
00162       Verbose::out(1,errorMsg);
00163           return false;
00164         } // end while (goldStream >> goldString)
00165 
00166         // Require that the two lines have the same number of fields.
00167         if (generatedStream >> generatedString)
00168         {
00169           errorMsg = lineErrorMsg (generatedLine, goldLine);
00170       Verbose::out(1,errorMsg);
00171           return false;
00172         }
00173       } // end if (++lineCount > m_SkipLines)
00174     }   // end while (! goldStream.eof() && ! goldStream.fail())
00175 
00176     // The two files should reach eof at the same time.
00177     if (! generatedStream.eof())
00178     {
00179       errorMsg = "The generated file, " + m_GeneratedFile
00180         + ", has more lines than the gold file, " + m_GoldFile;
00181       Verbose::out(1,errorMsg);
00182       return false;
00183     }
00184 
00185     // Require that the number of numeric differences above tolerance is below
00186     // the defined threshold.
00187     if (mismatchCount > m_AllowedMismatch)
00188     {
00189       errorMsg = "There were " + ToStr (mismatchCount) + " instances where "
00190         + "numeric fields differed by more than the accepted tolerance: only "
00191         + ToStr (m_AllowedMismatch) + " are allowed";
00192       Verbose::out(1,errorMsg);
00193       return false;
00194     }
00195 
00196     Verbose::out(1,"Same.");
00197     return true;
00198   }
00199 
00200 private:
00208   const std::string lineErrorMsg (const std::string& generatedLine, const std::string& goldLine)
00209   {
00210     const std::string msg = "Mismatch reading generated file " + m_GeneratedFile
00211       + ":\ngold line: '" + goldLine + "'\ngenerated line: '" + generatedLine + "'";
00212     return msg;
00213   }
00214 
00216   std::string m_GeneratedFile;
00218   std::string m_GoldFile;
00220   const double m_Eps;
00222   const unsigned int m_SkipLines;
00224   const unsigned int m_AllowedMismatch;
00225 };

00227 #endif /* MIXEDFILECHECK_H */
